languages.text: {n}Арджента мрачно оглядывает темные туннели.{/n} "Красться в тенях, таиться от битвы... недостойно воинов Его. Но ради спасения невинных я усмирю пламя в душе, требующее ворваться в стан врага в открытую".

{n}Argenta examines the dark tunnels morosely.{/n} "To skulk in the shadows, to hide from battle... these things are beneath His warriors. But for the sake of saving the innocent, I will dim the flame in my soul that urges me to charge openly at the enemy's ranks."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента мрачно оглядывает темные туннели.{/n} "Красться в тенях, таиться от битвы... недостойно воинов Его. Но ради спасения невинных я усмирю пламя в душе, требующее ворваться в стан врага в открытую".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta examines the dark tunnels morosely.{/n} "To skulk in the shadows, to hide from battle... these things are beneath His warriors. But for the sake of saving the innocent, I will dim the flame in my soul that urges me to charge openly into the enemy ranks."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta sonde l'obscurité des galeries d'un air morose.{/n} « Se terrer dans l'ombre, à l'abri des combats... Ces choses sont indignes de Ses guerriers divins. Mais si cela permet de sauver des vies innocentes, j'étoufferai le feu intérieur qui me pousse à charger l'ennemi de front. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta examines the dark tunnels morosely.{/n} "To skulk in the shadows, to hide from battle... these things are beneath His warriors. But for the sake of saving the innocent, I will dim the flame in my soul that urges me to charge openly at the enemy's ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta sonde l'obscurité des galeries d'un air morose.{/n} « Se terrer dans l'ombre, à l'abri des combats... Ces choses sont indignes de Ses guerriers divins. Mais si cela permet de sauver des vies innocentes, j'étoufferai le feu intérieur qui me pousse à charger l'ennemi de front. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは暗いトンネルを不機嫌そうに調べる。{/n}「陰でコソコソしたり、戦いから身を隠したりなどは…神の戦士としてふさわしくありません。だが、罪のない人々を救うためだ。敵陣に堂々と突撃しようとする魂の炎を消すとしよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta examines the dark tunnels morosely.{/n} "To skulk in the shadows, to hide from battle... these things are beneath His warriors. But for the sake of saving the innocent, I will dim the flame in my soul that urges me to charge openly at the enemy's ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは暗いトンネルを不機嫌そうに調べる。{/n}「陰でコソコソしたり、戦いから身を隠したりなどは…神の戦士としてふさわしくありません。だが、罪のない人々を救うためだ。敵陣に堂々と突撃しようとする魂の炎を消すとしよう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔看着黑暗的隧道，表情阴郁。{/n}“躲在阴影之中，避开战斗……神皇的勇士本不该做这样的事情。不过，为了拯救无辜的人，我愿意暂时熄灭灵魂的火焰，停住冲向敌人的脚步。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta examines the dark tunnels morosely.{/n} "To skulk in the shadows, to hide from battle... these things are beneath His warriors. But for the sake of saving the innocent, I will dim the flame in my soul that urges me to charge openly at the enemy's ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔看着黑暗的隧道，表情阴郁。{/n}“躲在阴影之中，避开战斗……神皇的勇士本不该做这样的事情。不过，为了拯救无辜的人，我愿意暂时熄灭灵魂的火焰，停住冲向敌人的脚步。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta untersucht mit düsterer Miene die dunklen Tunnel.{/n} "In den Schatten zu lauern, sich vor der Schlacht zu verstecken ... diese Dinge sind unter der Würde seiner Krieger. Doch um Unschuldige zu retten, werde ich die Flamme in meiner Seele besänftigen, die mich dazu drängt, auf die Reihen des Feindes loszustürmen."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta examines the dark tunnels morosely.{/n} "To skulk in the shadows, to hide from battle... these things are beneath His warriors. But for the sake of saving the innocent, I will dim the flame in my soul that urges me to charge openly at the enemy's ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta untersucht mit düsterer Miene die dunklen Tunnel.{/n} "In den Schatten zu lauern, sich vor der Schlacht zu verstecken ... diese Dinge sind unter der Würde seiner Krieger. Doch um Unschuldige zu retten, werde ich die Flamme in meiner Seele besänftigen, die mich dazu drängt, auf die Reihen des Feindes loszustürmen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta examina los túneles oscuros tristemente.{/n} «Escabullirse entre las sombras y rehuir el combate... son actos indignos de los guerreros del Emperador. Pero si esto salva a los inocentes, acallaré el fuego de mi alma que me impulsa a cargar contra el enemigo».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta examines the dark tunnels morosely.{/n} "To skulk in the shadows, to hide from battle... these things are beneath His warriors. But for the sake of saving the innocent, I will dim the flame in my soul that urges me to charge openly at the enemy's ranks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta examina los túneles oscuros tristemente.{/n} «Escabullirse entre las sombras y rehuir el combate... son actos indignos de los guerreros del Emperador. Pero si esto salva a los inocentes, acallaré el fuego de mi alma que me impulsa a cargar contra el enemigo».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, karanlık tünelleri daha kasvetli bir tavırla inceliyor.{/n} "Böyle gölgelere sinip saklananlara... Savaşçı demeye bin şahit ister. Ancak masumların bekası için ruhumun taarruz alevini söndürmeye razı geleceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta examines the dark tunnels morosely.{/n} "To skulk in the shadows, to hide from battle... these things are beneath His warriors. But for the sake of saving the innocent, I will dim the flame in my soul that urges me to charge openly at the enemy's ranks."
